Notes.Text:
This update for webkit2gtk3 fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2024-44308: Fixed processing maliciously crafted web content that may lead to arbitrary code execution (bsc#1233631)
  - CVE-2024-44309: Fixed data isolation bypass vulnerability (bsc#1233632)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in Safari 18.1.1, iOS 17.7.2 and iPadOS 17.7.2, macOS Sequoia 15.1.1, iOS 18.1.1 and iPadOS 18.1.1, visionOS 2.1.1. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited on Intel-based Mac systems.

Vulnerabilities.Description: A cookie management issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in Safari 18.1.1, iOS 17.7.2 and iPadOS 17.7.2, macOS Sequoia 15.1.1, iOS 18.1.1 and iPadOS 18.1.1, visionOS 2.1.1. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited on Intel-based Mac systems.
